channel.title: CREATE on Jun Kang's Blog
channel.description: Recent content in CREATE on Jun Kang's Blog

item.title: [PostgreSQL] CREATE TABLE AS (결과물을 테이블로)
item.description:
1. CREATE TABLE AS 사용

-- 기본
CREATE TABLE films_recent AS
  SELECT * FROM films WHERE date_prod >= '2002-01-01';

--Synopsis
CREATE [ [ GLOBAL | LOCAL ] { TEMPORARY | TEMP } ] TABLE table_name [ (column_name [, ...] ) ] [ [ WITH | WITHOUT ] OIDS ]
    AS query

2. CREATE TABLE AS 옵션

- TEMPORARY / TEMP

        임시 테이블로 생성되며 세션이 종료될 시 삭제된다.

- WITH OIDS / WITHOUT OIDS
